summary: Water Reminder App - A modern, professional offline water tracking app with blue gradient theme, dark/light mode support, smart reminders, drink logging, statistics, and health benefits information
architectural_notes: Blue gradient theme with light/dark mode support
Glassmorphism and card-based UI with rounded corners and shadows
Fully offline - no login or authentication required
Local data persistence for drink logs and settings
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Water droplet icon in blue gradient with glossy finish (water-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Animated water glass illustration showing empty to full states in blue gradient (water-glass.dim_256x256.png)
- Health benefit icons set: digestion, brain, immune system, skin, and energy in minimal blue style (health-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
- App logo featuring stylized water wave in blue gradient (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Home screen with daily water intake display showing consumed amount in ml, percentage progress, remaining water amount, and an animated water level visualization inside a glass graphic that fills according to progress percentage
Add large prominent 'Add Water' button and quick action buttons for preset drink sizes (e.g., 250ml, 500ml, 750ml) on the Home screen for rapid water logging
Create smart reminders system with custom time picker supporting AM/PM format, configurable auto-reminders at intervals (1 hour, 2 hours, etc.), and wake-up/sleep schedule configuration
Implement night mode feature that automatically mutes reminders during configured sleep hours, with toggle controls for sound, vibration, and notification preferences

Design and implement reminder popup UI displaying a list of all configured reminder times with enable/disable toggle for each individual reminder and a 'Reminder Settings' button linking to full settings

Design Health Benefits screen displaying water consumption benefits including better digestion, improved concentration, strong immune system, better skin, and more energy, with icons and visual progress indicators for each benefit

Implement Settings screen allowing users to change daily water target, enable/disable reminders globally, select reminder sound, toggle between Light and Dark theme modes, and switch units between ml and oz
Create side drawer navigation menu with links to Home, Drink Log, Reports, Reminders, and Settings screens with active route highlighting

Apply comprehensive design system with blue gradient theme (light blue #42A5F5 to dark blue #1565C0), supporting both Light and Dark modes, using soft gradients, glassmorphism effects, rounded corners (20dp), smooth shadows (6dp elevation), and modern card-based layouts throughout the application
Implement smooth animations and transitions for all interactive elements including page transitions, button clicks, drawer opening/closing, and water level filling animation
Remove all external branding including any references to Caffeine AI name from the application interface
Apply clean typography with proper hierarchy and consistent spacing throughout the application following modern design principles

new_feature_requests.summary: Home screen with daily water intake tracking, animated glass, and quick action buttons
Smart reminders system with custom times, auto-intervals, wake/sleep schedule, and night mode
Reminder popup UI with time list and enable/disable toggles
Drink log screen showing daily water history timeline
Reports screen with daily/weekly/monthly statistics and graphs
Health benefits screen with icons and progress indicators
Settings screen for water target, reminders, sound, theme, and units
Side drawer navigation menu with all main screens
Create Drink Log screen showing daily water intake history as a timeline list of drinking events with timestamps and amounts
Build Reports screen with daily, weekly, and monthly statistics including visual graphs, progress bars, and aggregated data showing water intake patterns
Ensure application works completely offline without requiring any login or authentication system, storing all data locally
